ModMetaData.name: [1001]Rapid Aging Pills (continued)
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds pills that, when fed to a pawn, ages them by 1 year.
I used to use a very similar mod, but it appears that the creator deleted it.
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: https://github.com/papercrane1001/-1001-RapidAgingPills
\n\nCredit to prism's MortarManiac and Noodles' More Psycasts for some extremely useful code. \n\nVersion 1.0.0 \nFor version 1.3.
